p.dialogue: It's raining outside. Make sure you don't catch cold, dear. Stay indoors as much as possible. I worry about you sometimes!
It's raining! That means we don't have to water the crops today. Nature can be a big help sometimes. Have you fed the animals yet, honey?
Good morning! I woke up early from the sound of the rain and made you some breakfast. [194 195 210 211 216] Stay warm and don't work too hard. I want you to stay healthy.
What's on your agenda today, dear? I don't want to go outside in this weather... I'll just do some things around the house. Maybe I'll make something hot for dinner.
Any dinner requests for tonight?
Despite all the technology we have, a rainy day is still the best tool for watering crops.
The countryside looks more interesting on a day like this, don't you think?
I think I might do some baking today.
Might want to do some fishing or mining today, huh?
Hmmph. If this weather keeps up I'll get too pale.
Make sure you stay dry today, dear. I don't want you to become hypothermic.
I got up just before dawn and took a walk around the farm. It's really peaceful at that hour.
Hmm... I guess I'll have to do push-ups and sit-ups indoors today.
The rain makes me think of my old life by the ocean. Change is part of life. That's okay.
I might spend some time today fixing any leaks in the roof or the windows.
I know you pride yourself on your work, but don't overdo it today. Okay, honey?
The roof's leaking? Ah well... a little mold never hurt anyone.
The rain makes it feel like we're all alone. I'm cold... Aren't you ready to tuck into bed?
Make sure you change into something warm. I don't want you to get sick. Can you hear the rain pattering on the roof, @?
Ah...The soothing sound of rain overhead... I'm going to sleep well tonight.
The rain makes our home seem so cozy.It's nights like this I'm glad we have a quality roof.
I made some soup for dinner. [199 218 219 727 730] You need something hot on a day like this!
I'm glad you're home... It's a good night to stay inside.
Were you able to accomplish much today, hun? I tried to fix up some things around the house... you know, just little stuff.
I'm ready to hop into bed whenever you are. The sound of rain will put us right to sleep.
Oh... the smell? I tried to do some baking... It didn't work out too well.
How was your day today, dear? Muddy?
Hi, honey. I'm so glad you're home. I was starting to get kind of lonely.
Hi. It's good to see you. I spent the day skimming through some medical journals.
I'll never grow tired of the rain... especially out here in the countryside.
Grandma always used to make hot stew on nights like this.
Sit down, relax! You've got to be tired after trudging through the mud all day.
Vincent called. He said he misses me and also to tell you hi.
I just got off the phone with Jas and Marnie. They seem to be having a pretty good time without me.
Certain spirits only appear in the rain. Maybe you've heard their cries?
Good morning ~< Ready for a hard day's work? I am.
Hi, honey! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216] You need food to stay energized throughout the day.
Did you sleep well? I've got some chores to do in here.

Did you have any strange dreams last night? I did, but all I remember is that it had something to do with a %adj %noun. Weird. Hehe. Dreams don't mean anything... do they, Honey? Well, we can't spend all day chit-chatting. You have work to do!
Good morning, dear. Another day of farm chores, huh? I'll be cheering for you. <
If you ever want to talk about how to maximize crop yield or anything... I'm open to that!
There's always something new happening on our farm... I love it.
This place is so big compared to the trailer, I feel overwhelmed... In a good way!
Mind if I add some architectural flair to the woodwork around here? My chisel hand is itching!
I always feel happy on a sunny day.
The sky looks great today... so clear! From now on, I'm only going to go into the clinic when I have appointments. Otherwise I can just work from home!
Well, this place sure beats my old basement room, doesn't it?
The sun's shining and I'm bursting with energy! You'd better watch out! Heh Heh.
I've been keeping a journal ever since we moved in together. Now that I actually have a life, I have lots to write about. I want to make sure I always remember these years.
There's too much stuff I want to get done today... Maybe I'll just watch TV instead.
By providing fresh, healthy produce to the community, we're doing a great service!
There's something special in the air... *sniff*... what is that? Oh... It's just this old corn chip I put in my pocket a few weeks ago. *crunch*
Did you get everything done today, @? I did some house chores... but now I'm so tired. I'm ready for bed whenever you are.
Wow, you look like you did a lot of work today. Now you should just relax and kick back for the night.
I'm glad you're home. I get kind of scared alone at night.I get lonely at night... ...
Are you done with your work for the day? I'm ready to have some fun. But if you're tired I understand.
*phew*! I just finished my chores. Now we can spend some time together. So, tell me about your day. ...
You look like you're ready for bed, @. Should I lull you to sleep with the technical details of my latest project? *yawn*... To be honest, I'm kind of sleepy too.
Are you ready for bed soon? I turned on the electric blanket for us...
Hi there, honey. Ready to spend a quiet evening at home?
It's so quiet and peaceful in the evening. Nothing to distract you from the experience of living.
You look like you've been working hard, dear. Let me help you de-stress.
You look like you could use a good massage tonight. Doctor's orders... It's good for the circulation!
I may be a reclusive guy, but I'm always happy when you're around. Hi, @. Good to see you. It's comforting when you're around.
My arms feel a little restless... How about a nice, deep massage?I feel exhausted... That's a good sign! It means I worked hard enough today.

You always smell so good after a day of hard work. It's your natural musk! You smell sweet, my dear. Like a honeycomb drifting on a pool of spice tea. Come here, let me massage your back. You look tense.You smell sweet, my dear. Like a cinnamon leaf floating in the summer breeze.
I wonder if the moon is visible tonight? So, did you get everything done on the farm today? If you didn't I won't be mad!
It's a very cozy house... I like it.
How was your day? Mine actually went pretty well.
It's a beautiful day today, isn't it? Days like this make work a little more pleasant.
I'm just going to relax and inspect the farm today, okay? It's just such a nice-looking area.
Hi, honey! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry! I'll be thinking of you.
I'm just going to do some dusting over here. That should help you out, right? *phew*... it's hot out here.
Don't overwork yourself, dear. Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.
I like being out here. It's a good place to think about new inventions. I'm still hoping to come up with something to help you out in your work.
I'm just going to hang out here, okay? There's a lot of interesting bugs and things out here. *chuckle*
Looks like a good day to work on my tan, don't you think, sweetheart?
Wow, this is great! I'm really starting to enjoy life on the farm, @. This is the life I've always dreamed of.
I'm really happy on our little farm, @.
This is so different from my old life, but I'm really starting to like it. I feel like I really belong here.
This is so much nicer than being cooped up in the clinic all day. I love watching you on the farm... hehe
Today, I'm going to continue writing my new novel. What better place than our wonderful farm? This is perfect.
I'm going to get a bunch of exercise today! Haha! I love living on a farm.
Hey, look at those puffy clouds in the sky, honey! I'm going to watch those for a while, if you don't mind.
I dunno if my lungs can handle this freshness. I'm still used to JojaAir.
You're doing great work, @. Keep it up.
I have to go into the clinic today. Have a nice day, okay?
I have to go into town today. Don't work too hard, and eat something good for lunch!
I have to leave for work soon. I'll see you tonight. I'll be thinking of you!
Hi, honey. How was your day? *Phew*... I'm exhausted... My patients are still healthy, so it was a good day.
Good evening. My day was fine, thanks! How was yours? Jas and Vincent weren't behaving very well today. I'm still all wound up...

Well, it was just another boring day at the clinic. Hey. Did you have a more exciting day than me? I hope so. Well, It's time to kick back and relax. Did you leave me any dinner? I'm just looking forward to bed-time.
Have you spent any time with %kid1 today?
I wonder if %kid1 will grow up to be a farmer like you?
Don't worry, I'll feed %kid1 today. You can just focus on running the farm.
Life's a lot different now that we have a child.
I already gave %kid1 and %kid2 their breakfast. They were hungry!
We have to make sure and give %kid1 a lot of attention now that we have %kid2. We don't want any jealousy between them.
You know, I think %kid2 has your nose.
A nice house, two wonderful kids, and a beautiful plot of land. What's left?
It's hard to believe we're finally married...
You know, I always had a feeling we'd be together some day.
Are you enjoying the married life, @? I am.
Wow, you look really handsome today!Wow, you look beautiful today.
This place is my home now... I'm happy here.
I was just admiring my wedding amulet... The shell is flawless. It must have cost you a fortune!
Be careful out there! Sometimes I worry about you falling into a mine shaft.
@? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.
Don't worry about me... I know you've got a lot of responsibilities outside of the house. I'm fine in here by myself!
Oh, I'm not bored... I'm just enjoying what we have here. It's a simple life, but I like it.
I hope you'll still like me when I'm old and gray.
Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?
Taking a break? I guess being a farmer is easier than I thought...
If you go into town, make sure and say hi to everyone for me.
I'll do the laundry tomorrow morning before you get up... that way you won't have any down-time.
Are we doing okay on money, @?
I wonder what everyone in town is doing today?
I don't really feel like doing anything today.
No matter how much I clean, the house keeps getting dirty again. I guess farms can be kind of dirty.
I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
...Do you still love me?
*sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.
Are you still happy with me?s
Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.
Do you ever wonder what else is out there?
You used to be romantic... what happened? I know I'm not as young as I used to be... is that what you married me for?
We only have one short life to live... is this the best way to do it?
I used to be your sweetie... now you only seem to put up with me when I make a hot dinner.
You've been so cold to me lately...
I wonder if I could've done better.
Well, a new year has arrived. Do you have a plan for what you want to accomplish this year? I feel pretty hopeful.
Now that winter's over, we've got lots of productive weather to look forward to.
I hope you've been practicing your moves... tomorrow is the flower dance!
Make sure you don't get a heat stroke, dear. Drink plenty of water and don't overwork yourself.
Sorry if I smell... I was sweating all night in the heat.
It's summer... that means the house is full of flies. Don't worry, I'll take care of them.
This weather feels pretty nice after the heat of summer.
Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house. Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.
Have you figured out what you're going to use for our grange display tomorrow?
Should we go to the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night?
Brrr.... It's cold. I guess winter has arrived.
Are you going to enter the fishing contest tomorrow?
Thanks for a great year, @. I'm excited to tackle next year together.
I'm feeling excited for a new year of farming, @!
I may like the colder seasons, but by the end I'm always glad to see spring arrive.
Aren't you glad winter's over, honey? Things seem more hopeful now.
Don't forget to look for wild horseradish, leeks and dandelions while you're out there!
I'm so happy to see some greenery after that long white winter.
Wow, my skin is pale... I guess I'd better help you with some farm work this season.
Let's plant some healthy vegetables this spring.
I'm looking forward to a beautiful year on %farm farm.
Hey @. Let's work hard today!
*sniff* ... My doze is stubbed up... allergies.
Maybe I'll learn a new skill this year...
It's a good time of year to do some stargazing.
Oh man... I could go for some chocolate cake.
You must know by now that summer is my favorite season.
Nothing pairs so well with summer like a nice sweet wine. Don't you think, honey?
Are you growing any melons this summer?
I'm going to stay inside as much as possible this summer.
Make sure you don't get sunburnt, honey... That can really damage your skin.
One of the main things I miss about the ocean is the fresh fish.
I always have the most energy in the summer.
Summer always makes me want to eat more barbecue.
Phew! It's hot but it feels great, doesn't it? Maybe we'll see some wild parrots today.
What's on my agenda today... hmmm... I think I see some spicy pretzel snacks and a couple of 'cold boys' on the horizon.
I'm glad I still work at the clinic... It's an important service for the community.
I hope we're growing pumpkins this year.
I'm craving cake. But not just any cake... it has to be pink.
Breathe deep... can you smell that? That tells me it's mushroom season.
It's so peaceful out here on the farm. I never appreciated nature that much living in town.
My mother used to always make this delicious pumpkin soup in the fall.
I could sure go for some wine.
Ah... Fall. The warm sun drifts low in the sky, casting long shadows over waving fields of gold. It's a beautiful time of year, don't you think?
I feel weak... I need some protein.
I wonder what's going on in the rest of the world? We're really secluded here.
I drank a super-food smoothie this morning and I feel aaah-mazing!
I think there might be a new species of fungus growing behind my mini-fridge. Ah well, 'tis the season, right?
Spring is coming soon. I'm really looking forward to having rhubarb pie.
Remember when we played that 'Prairie King' game together, in my room? Those were good times.
I was just thinking about the time you helped me open a jar of pickles. We've come a long way since then.
I always start craving salad in the winter... Inconvenient, I know.
I'm going to do a lot of reading this winter.
I wonder what Sam's up to? We used to be really good friends.
Winter is flu season, so work is probably going to be a lot more stressful. Sorry in advance if I'm grouchy.
I think I might do some writing this winter. There's not much else to do, anyway.
I hope my grandparents are doing okay. They used to rely on my help quite a bit. You know, with lifting heavy objects or whatever.
I've given up on being a musician. I'm a family man now!
Whoops, my hair is frozen solid again.
There's a wide, wide world out there... but I'd rather stay in my room.
I got up early to do a little star-gazing. I hope you don't mind if I spend some time on my projects today, honey.
I got up a little before you and fed David Jr. He's very active this morning. I hope you don't mind the guinea pig smell.
Go ahead and start your day, honey. I'm just putting on my make-up. Have any plans for the day?
One of these days I'll have to do your portrait. The view from this window is inspiring, don't you think?
I always wanted my very own library. This is so charming. I like to do a little reading first thing in the morning. It gets my brain into gear.
I'm debating whether I should work or just read comics all day. Hey, do we have any pizza in the freezer? I'm hungry.
No air-traffic this morning, honey. But it's still fun to break out the equipment now and then. I'm working on a new model plane. It's so much more relaxing here than in my old apartment.
I think I might do some writing today. Will you be okay without my help?
Don't ever let me get lazy. I want to stay in good shape for you! There's lots of room here to do my exercises. I'm making more progress than ever!
The old guitar... I don't have as much drive to play it anymore. That's fine. What's on your agenda today?
I'm going to spend some time with the parrot today. It breaks my heart that he'll never fly again.
Beer or cider? Sometimes life can be challenging. Hi, @. I'll just hang out in here today and uh... maybe sweep the floor a little bit or something.
Ah, It's more humid today with the rain... I feel a lot more comfortable.
The sound of the rain reminds me of the sewers... it's comforting. The sewers were my refuge... I felt safe there. But don't worry... I feel the same way about my new home, too.
I wish I could help you on the farm, but I can't go out in the sun...
Hi, @. Welcome home. You look like you've been working hard out there!
On a day like this, I can enjoy the outdoors with you. This is really nice! Just let me know if you see anyone coming, so I can hide.
Where am I supposed to sleep...?
I wasn't able to sleep well last night...
I had to sleep on the floor last night...
Did something happen to our bed...?
